name: mealie
description: Mealie is a self-hosted recipe management app that supports meal planning, shopping lists, and nutritional tracking. It offers multiple import methods, multi-user support, and a polished web UI.
features: Recipe management: Store and organize recipes with ingredients, instructions, and photos.
Meal planning: Plan meals for the week with drag-and-drop calendar interface.
Shopping lists: Generate shopping lists automatically from planned meals and recipes.
Recipe import: Import recipes from websites using URL with automatic parsing of ingredients and steps.
Nutritional tracking: View and track nutritional information for recipes and planned meals.
Multi-user support: Share recipes and meal plans with family members or roommates.
Tag system: Organize recipes with custom tags for cuisines, dietary restrictions, or occasions.
Search functionality: Find recipes by name, ingredient, tag, or nutritional content.
Recipe scaling: Automatically adjust ingredient quantities for different serving sizes.
Print formatting: Generate printer-friendly recipe cards and shopping lists.
Mobile app: Access recipes and shopping lists on mobile devices with dedicated apps.
API access: Integrate with smart home devices or other tools through REST API.
